title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 630.7 - Cancellations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 630.7 - Cancellations

State Regulations
(a) The Industrial

Commissioner may cancel a contract with a center if the center has: (1)
not complied with article 23-B of the

Labor Law or with the provisions of this Part or with the terms of its
contract; (2)
violated an
applicable Federal or State law; or
(3)
failed to maintain a quality program for
displaced homemakers. (b) The Industrial Commissioner shall not
cancel a contract unless upon due notice of 20 days and unless an opportunity
has been given to the center to be heard. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
630.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
